name: eniac-projeto
description: Projeto para a faculdade ENIAC 2ยบ Semestre

scripts.build: mvn -q clean package && rm -rf build/ROOT && cp -r target/${npm_package_name}/ build/ROOT
scripts.dev: concurrently "npx dotenv -e .env -- nodemon --watch src --ext java,html,css,js,jsp --exec 'npm run build'"

author: Ryan Prado
